page.title: 06SERVICES IN HARBURY - SHOPS
page.content: There are ten shops in Harbury. 5 of the shops sell food. 3 shops sell groceries. 3 sell fruit and vegetables. Only one shop sells newspapers. One sells stamps and and postal orders and writing accessories. One shop sells fresh meat, and tinned vegetables. One sells hardware and clothes. 3 shops are owned by a company. 7 are owned privately. 5 shops have an early closing day. The newsagents is open the longest - eleven and a half hours. 5 owners live on the premises. 5 owners deliver to their customers. 8 shops close at lunch time.
